description: Generate current timestamp in various formats. Runs as a constant to provide current time at flow start.

inputs.name: format
inputs.description: Timestamp format (optional). Leave empty for ISO string. Use preset keywords: 'iso', 'unix', 'unix_ms', 'rfc2822', or custom format string like 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'

outputs.name: timestamp
outputs.description: Current timestamp in the specified format
